name: Astroboard
description: Interested in synthesizers, music, or cute characters? Well Astroboard has them all. Whether you like casual music games, or intense rhythm games Astroboard lets you play how you like. Design instruments and apply them to any song you like, from there challenge yourself, practice, or set it to autoplay for a casual listen. Afterwards take all of your earned currency and unlock new themes for your stage, menu, and synthesizer. Customize to your hearts content and maybe learn some sound synthesis along the way! We hope you enjoy our game, <3
